document_data.name: Athauglas
document_data.mainbody: '''Athauglas''' was a [[green dragon]] who was killed by the [[Company of the Gauntlet]] in [[1223 DR]]. Before its death, it proclaimed that it held "the greatest treasure-house in all the Realms."
